column1: * 1917 - J.R.R. Tolkien attends a medical board examination.  He spends some time at Hornsea Musketry Camp.
* 1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Donna Sadlier.
* 2004 - There and Back Again: In the Footsteps of J.R.R. Tolkiens England is published.
* 2007 - The History of The Hobbit volume 1 is published.
* 2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
column2: "Doom of the Last-King" is released in Europe.

column1: ** Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf reach Rivendell after their adventures at the Lonely Mountain.
** Aragorn and Gandalf meet at Sarn Ford. Gandalf tells Aragorn of Frodo Bagginss plan to leave the Shire.
** Crowning of Aragorn. He bids Faramir to remain Stewards of Gondor.
** Elrond and Arwen set out from Rivendell.
** Samwise Gamgee marries Rose Cotton.Category:Datesde:1. Maifi:1. toukokuuta
